name: Constance La
bio: Hello! My name is Constance La and I am currently attending the University of Washington as an Informatics major. I plan to specialize in human-computer interaction, as I am interested in the design aspect of technology and how technology can be used to improve societal conditions for humans. Outside of Informatics, I am also interested in bouldering, tennis, guitar, art, and board games. Continue browsing through this website if you would like to learn more about the work I've done so far! Thanks for visiting!
